text: Alma Muriel (20 October 1951 - 5 January 2014) was a Mexican actress. She was known for playing villain roles on telenovelas. Muriel was born in Mexico City on 20 October 1951. She was partners with actor Joaqu√≠n Cordero. Muriel died from a heart attack on 5 January 2014 at her apartment in Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo. She was aged 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:People from Quintana Roo
title: Alma Muriel
